channel.title: Hendrix on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Hendrix on ZooBerry

item.title: Dependency Master File
item.description: This is a compilation of common dependencies (required downloads) for ZT2 usermade animals.

item.title: Three-Toed Sloth
item.description: Three-Toed Sloth is an animal for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by Hendrix and Unicorn.

item.title: Falling Snow
item.description: An emitter that creates falling snow and functions as a tour item.

item.title: Bog Pack
item.description: A Bog Pack made by Hendrix with new animals, objects, and a new biome.

item.title: Owston's Palm Civet
item.description: An Owston’s palm civet by Hendrix.

item.title: Giant Anteater II
item.description: A giant anteater by Hendrix and German13.

item.title: Emperor Tamarin
item.description: The Emperor Tamarin (Saguinus imperator) is a tamarin allegedly named for its resemblance to the German emperor Wilhelm II.

item.title: ZT2DC Gazebo
item.description: This download was created as a collaboration between many members for the first Skinning Collage Event at ZT2DC.

item.title: AVES
item.description: An expansive user-made expansion pack made by the ZT ABC Team!

item.title: Unicorn
item.description: Today, Unicorns are mostly illustrated as white horses with a single horn on the forehead. But this is not correct. The best idea of the unicorn’s appearence can be found on gobelins.

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: REPTILIA
item.description: Reptilia is a new expansion pack made by ZT ABC!
